name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Advances in Education and Information Technology
content: For papers submitted to AEIT 2022, we offer the publication as following: 1\. Publication in International Conference Proceedings. Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and accepted papers will be included into International Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to Ei Compendex and Scopus for indexing. 2\. Publication in Journal. Selected papers will be published in the International Journal of Information and Education Technology as a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus, Inspec, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc
